name: GuesstheCountry
0:
”Alexa, ask guess the country a question”
”Alexa, start guess the country”
”Alexa, play guess the country”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guess the country
des: Hello. Learn capitals and countries with this skill set. A wide range of countries are discussed here and it can be very informative. The interaction is pretty straight-forward. Just start by saying 'Alexa ask guess the country a question'. Answer the question with phrases like, 'Is it ___?'. The game can be played iteratively at ease. Let your adventurous journey begin!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
